gst.ui.dialog

Class AnnotationSelectionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.ui.dialog.AnnotationSelectionDialog

  • public class AnnotationSelectionDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    A dialog that asks the user to select an annotation-entry of all datasets.
    Version:
    0.1.1 (06.08.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  AnnotationSelectionDialog.AnnotationSelectionDialogActionListener
      Simple ActionListener that changes the annotation combobox when a new dataset is selected.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void changeAnnoComboBox()
      Changes the combobox with the annotations according to the selected dataset.
